summary: Completed frontend testing of ZWAP! Coin PWA - All requested features verified working: Dashboard shows Today's Progress block, Connect Wallet removed from header (only in sidebar), Profile badge has cyan indicator dot, Sidebar is scrollable, All settings navigation works, Feature cards and bottom navigation work correctly.
passed_tests: Dashboard loads with 'Today's Progress' stats block visible at top - PASSED
Header does NOT have Connect Wallet button (removed) - PASSED
Profile badge has cyan pulsing indicator dot - PASSED
Profile badge opens sidebar when clicked - PASSED
Sidebar has overflow-y-auto class for scrolling - PASSED
Connect Wallet button IS in sidebar (correct location) - PASSED
Settings: Profile → /profile navigation works - PASSED
Settings: Contact → /contact navigation works - PASSED
Settings: Privacy Policy → /privacy navigation works - PASSED
Settings: Terms of Use → /terms navigation works - PASSED
Settings: FAQs & Help → /about navigation works - PASSED
Feature card: MOVE shows wallet prompt for non-connected users - PASSED
Feature card: PLAY shows wallet prompt for non-connected users - PASSED
Feature card: SHOP → /shop works (no wallet required) - PASSED
Feature card: SWAP shows wallet prompt for non-connected users - PASSED
Bottom nav: Home tab → /dashboard works - PASSED
Bottom nav: Move tab → /move works - PASSED
Bottom nav: Play tab → /play works - PASSED
Bottom nav: Shop tab → /shop works - PASSED
Bottom nav: Swap tab → /swap works - PASSED
critical_code_review_comments: Connect Wallet button correctly removed from header, only appears in sidebar
Profile badge indicator dot implemented with bg-cyan-400 and pulsing animation
Sidebar scrollability implemented with overflow-y-auto on SheetContent
All settings pages (Profile, Contact, Privacy, Terms, About) have proper content
Feature cards correctly show wallet prompt for features requiring wallet connection
Bottom navigation bar works correctly for all tabs
test_credentials: No auth required - wallet connection uses WalletConnect
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working: 1) Today's Progress block visible at top of dashboard 2) Connect Wallet button removed from header, only in sidebar 3) Profile badge has cyan pulsing indicator dot 4) Sidebar is scrollable with overflow-y-auto 5) All settings pages navigate correctly (Profile→/profile, Contact→/contact, Privacy→/privacy, Terms→/terms, FAQs→/about) 6) Feature cards work correctly - SHOP navigates directly, others show wallet prompt 7) Bottom navigation bar works for all tabs (Home, Move, Play, Shop, Swap)
